card.name: Ov Sidia
card.text: ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature, you may reveal the top card of your deck for each of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. Put all Metallica that cost 6 or less from among them into the battle zone tapped and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. ■ Master Labyrinth: Whenever this creature attacks, if you have more shields or creatures than your opponent, you may shieldify all cards in your hand.

card.name: I am
card.text: ■ If you have 5 or more Mutopias in the battle zone, you may summon this creature For No Cost ■ Neo Evolution ■ Triple Breaker ■ If this is a Neo Evolution Creature, it gets +10000 power and "world breaker".

card.name: Gashagozra, Misfortune Demon 03
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put up to 3 non-evolution creatures that cost 3 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone. ■ Each of your creatures gets "slayer".

card.name: Immovable, Proud Soul
card.text: ■ Neo Evolution ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever one of your Neo Creatures attacks, you may add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. ■ Whenever one of your creatures would leave the battle zone, if they would go anywhere other than your graveyard, they stay in the battle zone instead.

card.name: Moai Land, Ancient Paradise
card.text: ■ Quattro Breaker ■ Your opponent can't cast spells or expand fields. ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, choose up to 3 of your opponent's shields and put them into their owner's mana zone.

card.name: Great Grasper
card.text: ■ Neo Evolution ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature and put it into its owner's mana zone. ■ Whenever one of your neo creatures attacks, you may put a creature that has power less than that creature from your mana zone into the battle zone.

card.name: Orlilia, Flash of Justice
card.text: ■ You may untap this creature to change your opponent's creatures attack to this creature or one of your tapped creatures. ■ Labyrinth: If you have more shields than your opponent, they can't cast spells that cost 5 or less.

card.name: Rock Speak Speaker
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. If those 3 cards have a total cost of 6 or less, put all creatures from among them into the battle zone tapped. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck.
